name: Web Development
description: Discusses Web development for sites that are dynamic, data driven, and interactive.

lessons.name: Introduction to Web Development
lessons.description: Overview of the web, browsers, and basic HTML.

lessons.name: Frontend Development
lessons.description: Introduction to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

lessons.name: Backend Development
lessons.description: Introduction to Node.js, Express, and databases.

name: Database Management Systems
description: Introduces relational database management systems as a class of software systems.

lessons.name: Introduction to Databases
lessons.description: Overview of databases, DBMS, and relational models.

lessons.name: SQL Queries
lessons.description: Introduction to SQL, DML, DDL, and querying databases.

lessons.name: Database Design
lessons.description: ER models, normalization, and database schemas.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Presents the mathematical techniques used for the design and analysis of computer algorithms.

lessons.name: Introduction to Algorithms
lessons.description: Basic algorithm analysis, Big O notation.

lessons.name: Sorting and Searching
lessons.description: Overview of sorting algorithms like merge sort, quicksort, and binary search.

lessons.name: Graph Algorithms
lessons.description: Introduction to graph algorithms, BFS, DFS, and shortest paths.

name: Foundations of Computer Science
description: Introduces systematic problem solving through programming, with a focus on object-oriented techniques.

lessons.name: Introduction to OOP
lessons.description: Basic principles of object-oriented programming.

lessons.name: Classes and Objects
lessons.description: Introduction to classes, objects, and methods.

lessons.name: Inheritance and Polymorphism
lessons.description: Advanced OOP concepts, including inheritance and polymorphism.

name: Discrete Structures
description: Introduces foundational CS structures and methods: sets, tuples, sequences, lists, trees, and graphs.

lessons.name: Sets and Logic
lessons.description: Introduction to sets, functions, and logic.

lessons.name: Proof Techniques
lessons.description: Basic proof techniques including induction, contradiction.

lessons.name: Graphs and Trees
lessons.description: Introduction to graphs, trees, and their applications.

name: Object-Oriented Design
description: Introduces object-oriented programming, focusing on objects, classes, methods, inheritance, and genericity.

lessons.name: Introduction to OOD
lessons.description: Basic principles of object-oriented design.

lessons.name: Design Patterns
lessons.description: Overview of common object-oriented design patterns.

lessons.name: Advanced OOD Concepts
lessons.description: Advanced object-oriented design concepts like SOLID principles.

name: Data Structures, Algorithms, and Their Applications within Computer Systems
description: Introduces data structures, algorithms, and their practical application within system-related topics.

lessons.name: Introduction to Data Structures
lessons.description: Basic concepts of data structures and algorithms.

lessons.name: Algorithm Design
lessons.description: Techniques for designing efficient algorithms.

lessons.name: Application of Data Structures
lessons.description: Applications of data structures in system programming.
